queries.title: Mean inference latency
queries.query: sum by (name) (rate(ovms_inference_time_us_sum{namespace='${namespace}', name='${model_name}'}[1m])) / sum by (name) (rate(ovms_inference_time_us_count{namespace='${namespace}', name='${model_name}'}[1m]))

queries.title: CPU usage
queries.query: sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{namespace='${namespace}'}* on(namespace,pod) group_left(workload, workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace='${namespace}', workload=~'${model_name}-predictor-.*', workload_type=~'deployment'}) by (pod)

queries.title: Memory usage
queries.query: sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace='${namespace}', container!='', image!=''} * on(namespace,pod) group_left(workload, workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster='', namespace='${namespace}', workload=~'${model_name}-.*', workload_type=~'deployment'}) by (pod)
